Title: The Hobbit
Author: J.R.R. Tolkien
Summary: A hobbit's quest to reclaim a treasure guarded by a dragon.

Author: George Orwell
Summary: A man is watched constantly by a totalitarian regime.

Title: The Great Gatsby
Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
Summary: A mysterious millionaire throws lavish parties in 1920s America.

Title: Pride and Prejudice
Author: Jane Austen
Summary: A headstrong woman navigates society and love in 19th-century England.

Title: To Kill a Mockingbird
Author: Harper Lee
Summary: A lawyer defends an innocent black man in a racially divided town.
